question: What is the theme of the World Immunization Week 2020, which is being celebrated from April 24 to 30, this year?
explanation:
The World Immunization Week 2020 is being celebrated from April 24 to 30, this year by the World Health Organisation. 
The day is celebrated with an aim to promote the use of vaccines for protecting people across the world from diseases. The theme of this year’s week is Vaccines Work for All. The theme highlights the importance of vaccines and the persons developing them. WHO also announced that about 20 million children in the world today remain unvaccinated.
